Package com.gmail.aydinov.sergey.simple_debugger_plugin.processor

Class SimpleDebuggerEventQueue

java.lang.Object
com.gmail.aydinov.sergey.simple_debugger_plugin.processor.SimpleDebuggerEventQueue
All Implemented Interfaces:
SimpleDebugEventCollector, UiEventCollector
public class SimpleDebuggerEventQueue extends Object implements UiEventCollector, SimpleDebugEventCollector
Singleton queue for handling UI and Debug events in the Simple Debugger. Supports multiple producers (UI or Debug threads) and consumers (Worker threads).

Author: Sergei Aidinov
Email: sergey.aydinov@gmail.com
